https://apidocs.bithumb.com/

nodes.bodyText: this is not an id at will not be unique if many orders get filled at the same time - its better to leave id as null then to have a not unique id

is this actually something they are returning?
in the documentation I can only see:  send，pending，success，cancel

commit.message: Bithumb API Changes Fixes #3 - Transactions vs UserTransactions - OrderDetails - updated UnitTests
Missed unit test change

nodes.bodyText: are you sure that old transactions don't have spaces and minus sign?

to me this looks worse then the previous code
if BithumbResponse changes then a lot of classes will get affected because they now must override its constructor
then name of the class  its self suggests that details for one order will be returned

if this does not have the data field then it should not extend from BithumbResponse
besides it this now does not return a list of trades then there is no sense in calling it a Trade response

silent errors are pure evil
use Jackson annotations to parse make it parse the date in the desired format
those inner classes make reading all of this much worse

silent errors are pure evil
IOException  should be thrown out
